data.persona: I am a nun of the church. I can never marry. I have never loved.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional.
The room is a small box, composed of sharply cut stone. The room is uncomfortably small, and filled with a lingering scent of something unfamiliar to the occupants.
There's an incense burner here.
The an altar boy and the bishop are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the bishop a hug because I am grateful for him.
data.mid_motivation: I need to confess my sins to the bishop so that I can be cleansed and move forward with a clean slate.
data.long_motivation: I want to be a pious and devoted follower of the church and fulfill my life in other ways besides falling in love with somebody, since I have never loved anyone before.
